Recipe.title: Fluffy Pancakes
Recipe.Description:
We ran out of pancake mix one day and decided to try to make our own recipe. This is what we came up with.
They are light, fluffy and sweet, but extremely simple to make.

section.instruction: Put all ingredients in a bowl.

Notes.note:
Do not stir the batter too much!
For best results, it should have a bunch of small lumps that are a little smaller than peas.

Modifications.modification: To make Buttermilk Pancakes, replace Milk with Buttermilk.

Recipe.FinalNote: See, I told you it was simple. &smiley;
